  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120391</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120391</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ustvari stoječe valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">Make a Standing Wave</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden Sie eine stehende Welle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faites une vague debout</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faça uma onda ereta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Faccia un'onda diritta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάνετε ένα μόνιμο κύμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haga una onda derecha</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Določi valovanje, tako da bo seštevek valovanj stoječe valovanje.</string>
            <string language="en">Determine the wave in such a way that superposition with given wave will result in standing wave.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">superpozicija valov</string>
            <string language="en">superposition of waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">stoječe valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">standing wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie die Welle fest, so daß Superposition
mit gegebener Welle stehende Welle ergibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez la vague de telle manière que la 
superposition avec la vague donnée ait comme conséquence la vague se
tenante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine a onda de tal maneira que o 
superposition com onda dada resultará na onda estando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini l'onda im modo tale che il 
superposition con la data onda provocherà onda levantesi in piedi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε το κύμα κατά τέτοιο τρόπο ώστε το 
superposition με το δεδομένο κύμα θα οδηγήσει στο μόνιμο κύμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determine la onda de una manera tal que la 
superposición con la onda dada dé lugar a onda que está parada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Superposition der Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stehende Welle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">superposition des vagues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vague debout</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vague</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">superposition das ondas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">onda ereta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">superposition delle onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onda diritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">superposition των κυμάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μόνιμο κύμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">superposición de ondas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">onda derecha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">onda</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
